title: How new House Speaker Mike Johnson spent years fighting against gay rights
description: New House Speaker Mike Johnson spent years building his career and profile by denouncing gay people and fighting against gay rights, which he staunchly opposes

title: WATCH:  Cincinnati Zoo hippos show off their pumpkin-crushing skills
description: Just listen to that satisfying crunch.

title: Rep. Bowman charged with pulling fire alarm ahead of House spending bill vote
description: Rep. Jamaal Bowman has been charged for falsely pulling the fire alarm at a House office building last month, according to court records.

title: Warmer than usual summer blamed for hungry javelinas ripping through golf course
description: Operators of the golf course think they have finally found the right repellent.

title: Professor who never showed up for class believed to be in danger: Police
description: A professor at an upstate New York university is believed to be in danger after he never showed up to teach on Saturday, police said.

title: Beer belly wrestling, 'evading arrest' obstacle on tap for Florida Man Games
description: The competitions are themed according to the phenomenon known as “Florida Man.”

title: Murder charge reinstated against former cop in shooting of Eddie Irizarry: Report
description: A judge has reinstated all charges, including murder, against a former Philadelphia police officer Mark Dial in the shooting of Eddie Irizarry.

title: WATCH:  3-year-old asks au pair to read coffee machine manual before nap time
description: Au pair Megan Mordaunt said it was the first time the girl had asked her to read her the iced coffee machine manual.

title: Actor Jonathan Majors to go on trial next month
description: Marvel star Jonathan Majors will go on trial on Nov. 29, according to the Manhattan district attorney.

title: WATCH:  Man who allegedly pretended to point gun at officers jailed
description: A 35-year-old man who allegedly pretended to point a gun at police and tried to bite an arresting officer has been jailed for 14 months.

title: Pre-cut onion products linked to salmonella outbreak in 22 states, CDC says
description: Gills Onions has voluntarily recalled multiple pre-cut onion products that may be linked to a multistate salmonella outbreak, according to the CDC.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried will testify in his own defense, lawyers say
description: Sam Bankman-Fried is expected to testify as soon as Thursday in his own defense, his lawyers signaled during a telephone hearing Wednesday.

title: USPS touts crackdown on postal crime, carrier robberies, with hundreds of arrests
description: More than 600 people with postal crimes since launching a crackdown in May.

title: City of Orlando buys Pulse nightclub property to build memorial to massacre victims
description: The city of Orlando is moving forward with plans to create a memorial on the property of the Pulse nightclub, where 49 people were massacred seven years ago

title: Former British police officer jailed for abusing over 200 girls on Snapchat
description: A former British police officer has been sentenced to life in prison with a minimum term of 12 years after he pleaded guilty to over 100 child sex offenses

title: WATCH:  Hurricane Otis makes landfall near Acapulco
description: Palm trees sway in strong wind and driving rain as Hurricane Otis strengthens to a Category 5 storm and makes landfall in Mexico.

title: Jewelry store customer trapped in locked room overnight in New York
description: The room was set on a timelock, not scheduled to reopen until start of business the next morning

title: Police chief's son, wanted in shooting of 2 officers is found dead, officials say
description: Authorities say the estranged son of Nashville’s police chief, who was wanted in the shooting of two police officers, has been found dead

title: Belgian police are looking for Palestinian man following report he could plan attack
description: Belgian authorities say they are “actively” searching for an asylum-seeker of Palestinian origin after media reported that he had threatened an unspecified attack

title: Mother of Travis King says family plans to 'fight charges hard'
description: The mother and stepfather of Travis King said that the charges against him do not align with the person they know.

title: Russian parliament's upper house rescinds ratification of global nuclear test ban
description: The upper house of the Russian parliament has revoked the country's ratification of a global nuclear test ban

title: Man convicted of IS membership detained in Germany, suspected of murder plan
description: Prosecutors say a man with a previous conviction for membership in the Islamic State group has been detained in Germany and is being investigated on suspicion of conspiring to commit murder

title: U.N. warns Gaza blockade could force it to sharply cut relief operations
description: The U.N. agency for Palestinian refugees has warned that without immediate deliveries of fuel it will soon have to sharply cut back relief operations across the Gaza Strip

title: Hurricane Otis makes landfall in Mexico as Category 5 storm
description: Hurricane Otis strengthened on Wednesday to a Category 5 storm as it made landfall in Mexico.

title: Israel-Gaza live updates: US confident Israel not responsible for Gaza hospital blast
description: Live updates on the Israel-Gaza conflict.

title: Carnival ruled negligent over cruise where 662 passengers got COVID-19
description: A cruise operator that failed to cancel a voyage from Sydney that led to a COVID-19 outbreak has been ruled negligent in an Australian class-action case

title: Israel-Gaza live updates: US confident Israel not responsible for Gaza hospital blast
description: Live updates on the Israel-Gaza conflict.

title: 'Shaft' star Richard Roundtree dies at 81 following brief cancer battle
description: Richard Roundtree, star of "Shaft" has died at 81.

title: Hurricane Otis now a dangerous Category 4 storm, and forecasters warn it could reach Category 5 before landfall
description: Hurricane Otis now a dangerous Category 4 storm, and forecasters warn it could reach Category 5 before landfall
